TopicTitle: Anyone know a bit of code I could use to hide the Time Warp text?

Articles.Content:
I'm developing a little plugin (for personal use probably) which lets you adjust the physics warp speed manually, and if you set a low speed, for example, 0.01x, the "Time Warp 0.0x" text will hang around for 100 seconds realtime, making recording slow motion shots incredibly difficult, so I need a line of code which temporarily hides that piece of text.

If anyone has any ideas, or can point me in the right direction that would be great!
Have you checked ScreenMessages / ScreenMessages? Its one of the ways to print sth onto the screen.
